events.message: The claimant reported a collision involving their vehicle on a busy intersection at 8 AM.
After initial review, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident in the system.
An agent was assigned to handle the claimant’s auto accident case promptly.
The insurance company sent an acknowledgment message confirming the claim receipt and next steps.
The claimant was asked to submit police reports, photos of damage, and vehicle registration documents.
All requested documents including photos and police reports were successfully submitted by the claimant.
The team began investigating the details of the auto accident to verify the damage claims.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the claimant’s vehicle was at fault in the accident.
The insurer proposed a settlement amount covering the reasonable repair costs to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and prompt responses from the agent.
Approval was granted for the settlement amount and proceeded to payment issuance stage.
The payment for the claim settlement was successfully transferred to the claimant’s bank account.
The claim file was officially closed following full settlement and claimant confirmation of repair completion.
All records of the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance audit.
